item.title: Grammatical Gender
item.description: A short example-driven introduction to the linguistic concept of grammatical gender.

item.title: Demo: Fretboard Diagram Creator
item.description: Online tool for creating fretboard diagrams, e.g., for scale charts with fingerings.

item.title: Basic Web App with Rust
item.description: This post describes the Rust stack for a basic web app that consists of a REST API, a Postgres database and a few views with JavaScript and CSS.

item.description: Live demo of an improved visual graph editor built with D3.js

item.description: Herschel-Maxwell derivation of the normal distribution.

item.description: Review of identifying collocations via hypothesis testing.

item.title: Transducing German Cardinal Numbers
item.description: Converting spelled-out German cardinal numbers to numerals and vice versa. Exercise in writing finite-state transducers.

item.title: Finite State Optimality Theory: Final Obstruent Devoicing
item.description: Annotated walkthrough of the finite state OT implementation for word-final obstruent devoicing by Gerdemann and Hulden (2012).

item.description: Switching from Hugo to a self-hacked solution for generating this static site.

item.title: The Dropout Learning Algorithm: Math Review
item.description: Stochastic functions and some combinatorics for Baldi and Sadowski (2014).
